name: Brick Puzzle Legend
description:
Brick Puzzle Legend is one of the best puzzle games . It's classic block puzzle game. Break bricks forming lines, earn points and chase the highest score with with this full of fun and very entertaining free game.

Brick Puzzle Legend is very simple game. Just break as much as possible lines formed by carefully placed bricks and chase the best score.

How to play:
Navigate and place the falling blocks to the empty spaces to form a line which will break. It is possible to form and break more than one line :)

Brick Brick Puzzle Legend will never disappoint you with its simple gameplay and nice graphics!

Play it now, break bricks and achieve the best score!

Brick Puzzle Legend provides Leaderboard your results and compete with your friends.

Challenge for your mind with one of the best free games available! Just play this amazing classic bricks game now!
